hero.title: Take Control of Your Stress
hero.subtitle: A personalized stress management platform designed for life in Kazakhstan
hero.description: Quick daily tools, cultural understanding, and professional support to help you build mental resilience.
hero.cultural_subtitle: Respecting Kazakhstani values while promoting mental wellness for all communities

features.title: Built for Your Life in Kazakhstan
features.subtitle: Our platform provides comprehensive tools to identify, understand, and manage stress before it becomes a problem.

local_support.title: Local Resources

testimonials.title: Trusted by People Across Kazakhstan
testimonials.subtitle: Real stories from real people who have transformed their relationship with stress

aigul.content: This platform helped me understand that stress management is not a luxury, but a necessity. The cultural sensitivity and local resources made all the difference.

dmitry.content: As someone working in tech in Nur-Sultan, the quick daily tools fit perfectly into my schedule. I've seen real improvements in just 3 weeks.

madina.content: Being a doctor, I understand the importance of mental health. This platform provides evidence-based tools that I now recommend to my patients.

cta.title: Ready to Build Mental Resilience?
cta.description: Join thousands of Kazakhstanis who are taking control of their stress and building stronger mental health.
